character.name: Dracula
character.description:
<c=E81B16>DRACULA</c>
Just running a pile of miserable errands.

ship.name: Batmobile
ship.description: Dracula's new ride. A bit fragile but can stock and recover hull points with ease.

droneTrigger.name: Drone Trigger
droneTrigger.description: <c=midrow>Drones</c> and <c=midrow>missiles</c> in front of your missile bays instantly take a turn.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: At the end of turn, <c=downside>take 1 damage</c> and decrease this by 1.

BloodMirror.name: Blood Mirror
BloodMirror.description: Whenever you take hull damage, your enemy also takes as much. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of each turn.</c>

Transfusion.name: Transfusion
Transfusion.description: At the start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c>. <c=downside>Decrease by 1 for each hull damage taken.</c>

Transfusing.name: Transfusing
Transfusing.description: When <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> reaches the amount of <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c> on this ship, <c=heal>heal for that amount</c> and remove both.
descriptionLong: When <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> reaches the amount of <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c> on this ship, <c=heal>heal for that amount</c> and remove both.
If you still have <c=status>TRANSFUSING</c> at the end of combat, <c=heal>heal for its amount</c>.

below.stateless: you are at or below half hull
below.stateful: you are at or below half (<c=boldPink>{{Hull}}</c>) hull

Normal.name: Bat
Normal.description: Applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, the owner gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty Bat
Bloodthirsty.description: Deals 1 damage and applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, <c=heal>the owner gets healed</c> for 1 and gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Protective.name: Protective Bat
Protective.description: Applies 1 <c=status>BLEEDING</c> to a ship in front of it, or to the owner. If the enemy was hit, the bat gains <c=midrow>BUBBLE</c>, or if it already has one, the owner gains 1 <c=status>TRANSFUSION</c>.

Batmobile.name: BATMOBILE
description: Gain 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c> while at or below 75% hull.
Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>SHIELD</c> upon dropping to or below 50% hull.
Remove <c=parttrait>WEAK</c> from your ship's wings while at or below 25% hull.
All attacks deal 1 extra damage while at 1 hull.
combatDescription: Gain 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c> while at or below 75% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull75}}</c>) hull.
Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and <c=status>SHIELD</c> upon dropping to or below 50% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull50}}</c>) hull.
Remove <c=parttrait>WEAK</c> from your ship's wings while at or below 25% (<c=boldPink>{{Hull25}}</c>) hull.
All attacks deal 1 extra damage while at 1 hull.

BloodBank.name: BLOOD BANK
description: Whenever you don't have a <c=card>Bat Debit Card</c> in your hand, gain one.
Whenever you <c=heal>heal any amount of hull</c>, add 1 <c=status>blood</c> to the <c=artifact>Blood Bank</c>.

ABType.name: AB Type
description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you are at max hull.

OType.name: O Type
description: At the start of combat, the <c=artifact>Blood Bank</c> recharges up to 3 charges.

description.None: Choose a status you have or had. Gain it for a hull price.
description.A: Choose a status you have or had. Gain it for a hull price.
description.B: Choose a status you or the enemy have or had. Gain it for a hull price.

description.None: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>.
description.A: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>.
description.B: All your ship parts <c=action>attack</c> for {{Damage}} and <c=action>stun</c>. <c=heal>Heal</c> for damage done.

description.None: Align your cannon with the closest weak part.
description.A: Align your cannon with the closest weak part.
description.B: Align your cannon with the closest weak part. Move back on turn end.

description.None: All your ship parts get armor until the start of the next turn.
description.A: All your ship parts get armor until the start of the next turn.
description.B: ALL ship parts get armor until the start of the next turn.

description.None: Choose 1 of {{Count}} Spell cards to add to your hand.
description.A: Choose 1 of {{Count}} Spell cards to add to your hand.
description.B: Add {{Count}} different random Spell cards to your hand.
